a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Economic decline in the second quarter of 2020
The percentage decline of GDP relative to the same quarter in 2019. It is adjusted for inflation.
Data source: Eurostat, OECD and individual national statistics agencies
Note: Data for China is not shown given the earlier timing of its economic downturn. The country saw positive growth of 3.2% in Q2
preceded by a fall of 6.8% in Q1
